title: Home
text:
My interests
I love working on problems that require combining analytics and numerics. One of my favorite projects so far was developing a Pymablock, Python package to do quantum mechanical perturbation theory efficiently, to any order, and with any number of subspaces.

ğŸ“– Documentation ğŸ’» GitHub Repository

title: About me
text:
My interests
I love working on problems that require combining analytics and numerics. One of my favorite projects so far was developing a Pymablock, Python package to do quantum mechanical perturbation theory efficiently, to any order, and with any number of subspaces.
